name: Rafiki Coalition
description: At Rafiki Coalition, our mission is to eliminate health inequities in San Francisco’s Black and marginalized communities through education, advocacy, and the provision of holistic health and wellness services in a culturally affirming environment. We are committed to empowering individuals and communities to achieve optimal health and well-being by addressing the physical, mental, and social factors that impact health. At Rafiki Coalition, our work is guided by core values that define our approa
